CASA Receive NEWS dApps Menu BROWSE
High Priority Estimated confirmation time: 10 min Medium Priority Estimated confirmation time: 30 min - several hours Low Priority Estimated confirmation time: over 24 hours Custom Fee Custom setting for advanced users
Custom fee Please enter the custom fee in BTC unit. (ex: 0.0001) Please enter only the number for the custom fee
I wrote it down Skip Set a PIN Set a touch ID Start
wallet succesfully created! You're almost ready to get started!\nWe just need to set up a few things.
Your Recovery Phrase Write down this recovery phrase! If you lose your device or the app you need this to recover your bitcoin and tokens. You can check it later in the settings. KEEP IT SAFE AND SECRET! If somebody has this phrase they WILL be able to steal your bitcoin and tokens.
Set a PIN this will be your pin code for the app allowing you to authorize transactions
Set up touch ID You can use touch ID instead of PIN if your device is able to use it.
Push Notification Allow You can receive transaction status and latest information with push notification!
Let's get started!
Enter your PIN. Please set up a PIN. Please set your PIN. Enter your CURRENT PIN. Password Incorrect Please confirm your PIN Redo
hide Address hidden, next time you create an address the same address will be recovered with itâ€™s tokens.
rename You can rename this wallet.
Rename Remove Add New Address Add address You can add a new address for your wallet
Private key Show this wallets WIF?\n\nPlease do not show it to anybody. Also, screenshots may be seen by others by unexpected synchronization.\n\nPlease note on paper and keep it in a safe place.
Show the Recovery phrase?\n\nPlease do not show it to anybody. Also, screenshots may be seen by others by unexpected synchronization.\n\nPlease note on paper and keep it in a safe place.
Important Basic Information Other
Recovery Phrase Check your Recovery phrase
Encrypt wallet with password Enable this if you are concerned about your device security
The ID identifies your wallet Choose your preferred currency
Touch ID Authorize transactions using your fingerprint
PIN code Change your PIN code
Sign out Sign out from your wallet Are you sure you want to sign out? We strongly recommend that you backup the Recovery phrase.
Encrypt Wallet Before encrypting your wallet with a password make sure you have a backup copy of your recovery phrase!\n\nIf you forget your password your wallet cannot be decrypted and you will need to restore from your recovery phrase Enter a secure password
Wallet Encrypted You will now be required to enter your password on app load
Release Please enter the encrypted password to decrypt the wallet. Take notes
Failed... Enter your password to decrypt the wallet again.
Wallet Released Wallet encryption was canceled.
This wallet has been encrypted.\nPlease enter your password to decypt this wallet. Lost your password?\nOnce you sign out, you can restore it with a recovery phrase. Incorrect Password Please enter your password to decypt this wallet again.
Incorrect Passphrase used.\nIt should be exactly 12 words. No more, no less. Invalid Passphrase entered.\nPlease check the phrase located at {pos}. Word incorrect, please input again.
The app would like to return to the wallet, is this ok?
Current Wallet Address (receive your bitcoin and tokens) (receive your ether and tokens) Touch qrcode to copy Copied to clipboard
Create a New Wallet Sign In Already have a Recovery phrase?
Privacy Policy & Terms of Service By using this app I agree to the above.
Are you sure you would like to create new wallet?
